{{cd|mysterious_frame_slot}} was an unused block {{in|Bedrock}}.

== Obtaining ==
{{cd|mysterious_frame_slot}} could only be obtained using third-party editors.

=== Breaking ===
{{breaking row|horizontal=1|Unknown|sprite=reserved6}}

{{cd|mysterious_frame_slot}} dropped nothing when broken.

==  Behavior ==
{{cd|mysterious_frame_slot}} had no behavior, and thus defaulted to the [[unknown]] block behavior. It broke instantly, and was able to be placed. Like ice, it had low friction.
